item.title: Now it’s TikTok parent ByteDance’s turn for a reasoning AI: enter Seed-Thinking-v1.5!
item.description: It achieved an 8.0% higher win rate over DeepSeek R1, suggesting that its strengths generalize beyond just logic or math-heavy challenges.

item.title: ‘The cost is a big unknown’: Should I buy a new car to avoid auto tariffs — or wait and hope that Trump suspends them too?
item.description: Trump’s 90-day pause on “reciprocal” tariffs does not extend to the 25% import tax on cars or auto parts.
